spell.name: Aftershock
entries: You shoot a sound wave that creates an aftershock in a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d4} thunder damage immediately and {@damage 1d4} thunder damage at the end of its next turn.
Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d4} at 5th ({@dice 2d4}), 11th ({@dice 3d4}) and 17th ({@dice 4d4}) level.

spell.name: Air Slash
entries: You create two blades of wind that is each shot at a creature within range. You can direct the shots at the same target or at different ones. Make a ranged spell attack against each target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d4} slashing damage.
Each wind blade’s damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th Level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Animal Litter
entries: You create an illusion of a Small or smaller beast you know. It acts like a normal animal, but looks spectral, makes sounds half as loud as normal and passes through creatures without hurting them.
At 11th level, you can create a Medium beast or smaller.

If a creature uses its action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

spell.name: Arc Discharge
entries: As an action, you expel an arc of lightning from your hand, shooting it in a direction of your choice. Creatures in a line 15 feet long, 5 foot wide starting from you must succeed in a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} lightning damage.
This spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach certain levels: 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Arctic Arrow

m.text: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you make a ranged weapon attack against one creature. On a hit, the target suffers the attack’s normal effects, and their speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

This spell's damage increases when you reach certain levels. At 5th level, the weapon attack deals an additional {@damage 1d10} cold damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d10} at 11th level and 17th level.

spell.name: Arctic Arrow
entries: A bolt of shadow springs from your hand and toward a creature within range, draining vitality where it strikes. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes {@damage 1d8} piercing damage. If you score a critical hit, you triple the damage dice instead of doubling them.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Beeline
entries: You conjure and hurl a bee-shaped shot with uneering accuracy. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} piercing damage. If neither you nor the target is behind cover, you make this spell attack with advantage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Bioluminescence
entries: You radiate light from your body, gaining one of the following features:

items: You cast bright light in a 30-foot cone and dim light in a 60-foot cone in front of you.
You shine bright light in a 20-foot radius around you and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

entries: The light can be colored as you like. You can extinguish the light as a bonus action.

spell.name: Blob Lob
entries: You lob a blob of ooze at a target within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 1d6} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Blooming Blossom
entries: You make a seed materialize at a creature within range which then blooms explosively. The bloom deals {@damage 1d4} force damage automatically to the target.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Brittle Beam
entries: You shoot a weakening bolt at a creature or object within range. If you target a creature, that creature can make a Constitution saving throw to resist the effects of this spell. On a failure or if the target is an object, the AC of the target is set to 13 if it is higher until the end of your next turn.

spell.name: Calling Attack

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you make a melee weapon attack against one creature. On a hit, the target suffers the attack’s normal effects and gets colored with a yellow light until the end of the target's next turn.
If the target does not move during its turn, it is hit by lightning strike at the end of its turn and takes {@damage 1d8} slashing damage.

At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} lightning damage to the target, and the lightning damage dealt by the yellow light increases to {@dice 2d8}. The damage rolls each increase by {@dice 1d8} respectively at 11th level and 17th level.

spell.name: Calm Mind
entries: You protect the mind of a target within range that you can see. You grant the target {@dice 1d4} temporary hit points that lasts for the next minute. You can only grant a single creature temporary hit points from this spell at any one time.
The temporary hit points increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Caustic Blast
entries: You send out a blast of potent acid at an enemy within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the next spell attack that hits the target is automatically a critical hit.

spell.name: Cellular Barrier
entries: You project a barrier that grants yourself {@dice 1d10} temporary hit points. This lasts until the start of your next turn.
This temporary health gain increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d10}), 11th level ({@dice 3d10}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d10}).

spell.name: Combustion
entries: Target a creature you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage and lights ablaze with a magical fire, shedding dim light in a 10-foot radius for the next minute or until the target puts itself out as an action. While ablaze, the affected creature or object can't benefit from being Invisible.
The damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Corrosion
entries: After focusing on a small to medium-sized metal piece you touch for 1 minute, you corrode the metal part you touch, weakening the metal.
If you corrode a metal item like a door lock or a chain, you have advantage on Strength checks to break the metal.
If you corrode a lock or a similar instrument, you have advantage on Dexterity (Thieves' Tools) checks to break the lock.
If you corrode a weapon, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to Damage Rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed.
If you corrode metal armor or a metal shield, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a Shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

spell.name: Crystalline Shard
entries: You create a crystalline shard and throw it at an enemy within range. You make a ranged spell attack at a creature within range. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage and the shard shatters, dealing 1 piercing damage to creatures within 5 feet of the target.
The cantrip’s main and spread damage increases by {@dice 1d6} and 1 respectively when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}, 2), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}, 3), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}, 4).

spell.name: Diamond Edge
entries: As an action, a large sharp edge of diamond erupt from one of your wrists for an instant. Your hand is considered occupied until the spell ends.
As a bonus action, you can make a melee spell attack against one creature within 5 feet of you using the diamond edge. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d4} slashing damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Dimensional Pocket
entries: As you cast this spell, choose one object that you are holding that is no larger than 1 foot on a side and weighs no more than 1 lb. (for example, you may choose a key, an amulet, a few folded pieces of paper, a small wand or dagger). That object disappears into an extradimensional demiplane linked to you.
Afterward, you may use your bonus action to end this spell to retrieve the item. If the spell ends or you lose concentration on the spell, any object you have stored appears immediately at your feet.

spell.name: Disturbance
entries: You extend your hand toward a creature you can touch and cause an disturbance in the material plane to extend from your palm, affecting the minds of the creature you touch. The creature must succeed on a Intelligence saving throw or take {@damage 1d10} psychic damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d10}), 11th level ({@dice 3d10}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d10}).

spell.name: Droplet Bomb
entries: You conjure a water bomb and throw it at an enemy within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target automatically fails the next Dexterity saving throw it must make.

spell.name: Eagle Eye
entries: As a bonus action, you intensify your eyes, granting you increased sight. Until the start of your next turn, you can see normally in dim light or though any lightly obscured area. In bright light, you can see twice as far away.

spell.name: Ebb and Flow
entries: You send water energy out to slap a target within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage and must make another Wisdom saving throw at the start of its next turn, taking an additional {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage on a failed save.
Both damage instances are increased by {@dice 1d6} respectively when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Echo Roar
entries: You send out a blast of echoed sound at an enemy within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d6} thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} until the start of your next turn.
Both damage instances are increased by {@dice 1d6} respectively when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Echoing Strike

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell's range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, the target is marked for the next minute. If the target is already marked, an arcane echo of your weapon follows your swing, dealing an additional {@damage 1d8} force damage.

This spell's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} force damage to the target, and the damage the target takes from the echo increases to {@dice 2d8}. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level and 17th level.

spell.name: Erratic Shot
entries: You create a erratically moving shot of pure chaotic energy and shoot it at one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} damage. The damage type depends on the number rolled:

This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d10}), 11th level ({@dice 3d10}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d10}). When rolling more than one damage dice, you can choose either of the dice when determining the damage type of the cantrip.

spell.name: Extended Arm
entries: You transmute your arm and extend it to push or pull an enemy within range. The target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage and is pulled up to 5 feet directly towards you or away from you (your choice).
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: False Mask
entries: You use your innate psionic powers to do one of the following things:

items: - See in another direction than the direction your eyes are currently at.
- Displace your hearing ability so that you hear from a location within 30 feet of you.
- Make a creature within 30 feet feel like they’re being touched by your hand.

spell.name: Feather Fan
entries: You slap a creature nearby with a fan of magically conjured feathers. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit you deal {@damage 1d6} slashing damage and knock the target {@condition prone}.
The spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Flutttering Bullet

m.text: a ranged weapon that costs at least 1 sp

entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you make a ranged weapon attack against one creature. On a hit, the target suffers the attack’s normal effects and gets colored with a pink light until the end of its next turn.
If the target deals damage to you while colored with the pink light, it takes additional piercing damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} piercing damage to the target, and the piercing damage dealt by the pink light increases to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier. The damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d6} at 11th level and 17th level.

spell.name: Force Lift
entries: A Medium or smaller creature or object is lifted 10 feet into the air by psionic magic. When dropped as a result of this spell, the first 10 feet fallen is ignored in fall damage calculations.
An unwilling creature can make a Strength save to resist this spell's effects.

spell.name: Force Push
entries: You use your psionic power to slam and push a target within range. The target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d6} force damage and is pushed 10 feet in a direction of your choice.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th Level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Fungal Bloom
entries: You target a creature within range and induce spores to bloom on the target. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes {@condition poisoned} and has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

spell.name: Gloom
entries: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension and is not wielded or held by another creature. Until the spell ends, the object reduces natural light in a 30-foot radius sphere. Inside the sphere, bright light becomes dim light and dim light becomes regular darkness.
The dimming effect created by Gloom cannot affect light from magical sources other than cantrips.

spell.name: Haboob
entries: You send out a blast of sand at an enemy within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition blinded} until the start of your next turn.

spell.name: Hoarfrost/Wildfire
entries: A melee weapon or up to 5 arrows you touch are imbued with deep cold or intense heat. For the duration, choose one of the following effects:

- Hoarfrost: a rime of frost covers the weapon or arrow and light vapor rises from it if the temperature of the surrounding area is below freezing. The weapon or arrow deals an additional {@damage 1d4} cold damage on a successful hit.

- Wildfire: A red light covers the weapon or arrows and light smoke rises from it if the weapon or arrow is burning hot. The weapon or arrow deals an additional {@damage 1d4} fire damage on a successful hit.

spell.name: Hypodermic Puncture
entries: You transform your hand into a poison-tipped point and grab an enemy within range. Make a melee spell attack. On hit, the target takes {@damage 1d4} piercing damage. At the start of the target's next turn, it takes an additional {@damage 1d6} poison damage.
The initial and the secondary damage increases by one die when you reach 5th ({@dice 2d4}, {@dice 2d6}), 11th ({@dice 3d4}, {@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}, {@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Intense Gaze
entries: You gaze at a target within range that you can see. The target must make a Intellingence saving throw. On a failed save, you have truesight against that creature until the spell ends.

spell.name: Lullaby
entries: You play a soothing melody at a target within range. If the target can hear you (though it need not understand you), it must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or become drowsy for the next minute, or until the target takes damage or someone uses an action to shake or slap the drowsy creature awake. While drowsy, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks involving the Insight, Investigation and Perception skills, and they also have disadvantage on saving throws against falling {@condition unconscious}.

spell.name: Mark the Prey
entries: You mark a target for hunting. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw or else the next attack roll against the target is made with advantage. If the attack hits, the target takes an additional {@damage 1d6} damage.
This spell's damage bonus increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Mental Ruin
entries: You use your psionic power to attack a target's mind. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save the target takes {@damage 1d4} psychic damage, and the first time it makes a saving throw before the end of your next turn, it must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from the save.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th Level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Miasma
entries: By altering the composition of the atmosphere a toxic cloud of gas comes into being at a target location within range. All creatures in a 5-foot radius sphere centered at the target location must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, creatures take {@damage 1d4} poison damage.
This spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Monochromatic Beam
entries: As an action, you target one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} cold, fire or lightning damage (your choice).
The damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Muffle
entries: A 10x10 foot {@condition invisible} barrier springs into existence at a point within 60 feet of you. The barrier appears in any orientation you choose and is 1/2 inch thick. No sound can pass through the barrier, however creatures and objects pass through it as normal. Passing through the barrier does not reveal its presence. Any damage dealt to the barrier instantly destroys it.

If a creature uses its action to listen carefully, the creature can determine that the sound is blocked by an illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion, it can hear sounds through the barrier as if it was water.

spell.name: Night Daze
entries: You target a creature within range. You send a shockwave of shadows at a target. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage. If the target has at least half of its hit points remaining, it has disadvantage on the saving throw.
This spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Pine Resin
entries: You target a surface within range, applying magical plant resin on the surface in a 5-foot radius circle centered on the target. Creatures within 5 feet of that space must succeed in a Dexterity saving throw or have their speed halved until the start of your next turn.

spell.name: Plant Matter
entries: As an action, you may create or modify a minor plant object. You create one of the following magical Effects within range:

items: You create a wooden plank up to the size of a human hand. It lasts for 1 hour and gradually rots away afterwards.
You create a single flower of your choice. It lasts for 1 hour and gradually rots away afterwards.

You touch a branch or a stick and elongate it into a wooden rod with a length of 10 feet. The rod is too thin to be effectively used as a staff. It lasts for 1 hour and gradually rots away afterwards.
You touch a leaf and transform it into an origami figure of your choice.
You touch a thick branch and transform it into a woodwind instrument of your choice for 1 minute.
You touch a leaf or a vine and transform it into up to 30 feet of hempen rope. It lasts for 1 hour and gradually rots away afterwards.

spell.name: Power Siphon
entries: You envelope your hand in corrupting necrotic energy and lash out at a target you can touch. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, you deal {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage and gain temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt. These temporary hit points last until the start of your next turn.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Projectile
entries: You magically fling an object in your possession or an unattended object within 5 feet of you at a target you can see within range. The object must be tiny and no heavier than 1 pound. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit target takes {@damage 1d10} bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, as appropriate to the form of the projectile being used in the attack. The projectile is magically protected against damage to it as a consequence of using it in the spell.

The spell creates more than one projectile when you reach higher levels: two projectiles at 5th level, three projectiles at 11th level, and four projectiles at 17th level. You can direct the rocks at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each projectile.

spell.name: Protection Bubble
entries: Choose one creature within range. Until the start of your next turn, the creature is protected by a magical bubble. If the creature takes damage while the barrier is active, the damage is reduced by {@dice 1d8} and the spell then ends on it.
At higher levels: You can target one additional creature at 5th (2), 11th (3) and 17th (4) level when you cast the spell.

spell.name: Psionic Platform
entries: You create a floating platform within 30 feet of you. It is 1 feet thick and 5 feet wide and long, and is It is only solid ground for creatures that choose to step onto the platform. The platform is almost transparent but has a slight purple translucent tint and can hold up to your body weight at any one time. You can dismiss the platform as a bonus action.

spell.name: Psyward
entries: You place a psionic ward on one willing target within range, which manifests as a purply shimmer surrounding it. The first creature to hit the target with a melee attack before the spell ends takes {@damage 1d8} psychic damage.
This spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Purge
entries: You target a creature within range and unleash a powerful light blast at it. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} radiant damage. If the target has any temporary hit points, it deals an additional {@damage 1d8} radiant damage.
Both instances of damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Purple Jolt
entries: You send a purple electrical bolt at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, you deal {@damage 1d6} lightning damage, and the lightning jumps from the target to another creature within 15 feet of the target. Make a ranged spell attack against the new target, dealing {@damage 1d6} lightning damage on a hit.
The cantrip’s main and secondary damage increases by {@dice 1d6} respectively when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Radiant Spear
entries: You create a spear of radiant energy and strike a target within range. Make a melee spell attack, dealing {@dice 1d4} piercing and {@damage 1d4} radiant damage on a hit.
The piercing and the radiant damage instance each increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Reverb
entries: You create a sound that echoes at a piercing high pitch. Choose one creature or object within range, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} thunder damage. Creatures made out of inorganic material such as stone, crystal, or glass have disadvantage on saving throws against the effects of this spell.
This spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Revert
entries: You do one of the following actions:

items: - You cause up to 100 ft of non-magical rope or string you touch to untangle itself, untying any knots on the material. Works on any string- or cord-like material (subject to DM discretion)
- You uncrumple a crumbled piece of paper or fabric to its original flat appearance.
- You return a burnt or wet piece of material to its pre-burnt or -wettened state. You cannot restore a completely disintegrated item.
- You remove a visible stain or odor from food, drink or dye on any non-living surface you touch.

spell.name: Rock Blast
entries: A conjured rock is shot at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage and has disadvantage on any concentration checks made as a result of the damage from this spell.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Runic Blast
entries: The user channels simple but powerful magic to deal damage. Make a ranged spell attack roll against an enemy within 60 feet. On a hit, you deal {@damage 1d8} force damage. If you have cast Runic Blast on a different target last turn, it deals {@damage 1d12} damage instead.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} and {@dice 1d12} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}, {@dice 2d12}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}, {@dice 3d12}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}, {@dice 4d12}).

spell.name: Screamer
entries: You disturb the minds of a creature within range with a short-lived nightmare. The creature must succeed on a Intelligence saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} psychic damage. If the target is {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} by you, it makes this saving throw with disadvantage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Seed Burst
entries: You target a creature within range, shooting explosive seeds you have conjured at the target. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, you deal {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage. This is increased to {@damage 1d12} damage if the target is currently suffering from at least one condition.
The spell’s damage increases by one die when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8} or {@dice 2d12}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8} or {@dice 3d12}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8} or {@dice 4d12}).

spell.name: Shake
entries: As an action, you target the floor within range. You make the ground in a 5-foot radius circle of the target shake vigorously, making nearby creatures lose their balance. Creatures in that area must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone}.

spell.name: Shape Wood
entries: You choose a section of wood that you can touch and that fits within a 5-foot cube. You manipulate it in one of the following ways.

items: - If you target a tree, whether rooted or fallen, you can reshape it to form a new shape that benefit you, such as a place to sit, steps for a makeshift ladder, or form a large open container. The wood you shape cannot be removed from its source of origin, however, nor can it be shaped to form something harmful, such as spears or spikes.
- You cause shapes, colors, or both to appear on the wood or bark, spelling out words, creating images, or shaping patterns. The changes last for 1 hour.

- If the wood you target is on a tree, whether rooted or fallen, you cause it to become difficult terrain as you reshape the bark and branches to twist in various ways. Alternatively, you can cause a fallen tree or a tangled cluster of trees and branches to become normal terrain if it is already difficult terrain. This change lasts for 1 hour.
If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have no more than two of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

spell.name: Shocker
entries: You cause a bolt of static electricity to hit a target within range, startling them. The creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} lightning damage and drop any object they are holding.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Snowball Barrage
entries: A snowball is shot at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} cold damage.

The spell creates more than one snowball shots when you reach higher levels: two shots at 5th level, three shots at 11th level, and four shots at 17th level. You can direct the shots at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each shot.

spell.name: Soak
entries: You hurl a bubble of water at targets. Choose one creature within range or choose two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage and have disadvantage on ability checks until the start of your next turn.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th Level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Solar Ray
entries: A solar ray is shot up to 90 feet in a straight line in a direction you choose from you, stopping early if it impacts against a solid surface. If the object would strike a creature, that creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the ray strikes the creature, dealing {@damage 1d8} radiant damage and stops. On a successful save, the ray passes through the creature and continues.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th Level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Spirit Call
entries: You call upon spirits that dwell decomposing in the earth to perform your bidding. These risen visages swirl in a 10-foot radius sphere around a point within range. For the duration, the spirits can manifest one of the following effects in the environment:

items: - You ask a question and the spirits answer. They do not possess a distinct voice or body, so the depth of their answer is limited by the environment they are called into. They might answer a question by flinging rocks in a particular direction, or scratching out letters on a sign. The spirits lack a specific identity, and are unlikely to know the answer to questions only a certain person might know, but otherwise have a general knowledge of the area and its history.
- The spirits snuff out any candles or similar lighting sources in the area.
- The spirits become visible only to a specific creature in that radius, and they target their attention on that creature, harassing them as best as their incorporeal nature allows.

- The spirits possess an {@condition unconscious} creature, a corpse, or a severed limb. For the duration they crawl in the direction indicated. If inhabiting a creature they are expelled if the creature ends their unconsciousness.
- The spirits cause unlocked doors and windows to fly open and shut, and hurl unsecured objects in random directions or cause them to levitate at random heights and intervals.

spell.name: Stalagmite
entries: You target a 10-foot square on the ground within range and create tiny rocks in that area. When a creature moves to a spot within the area, you can use your reaction to activate the rocks, transforming them into stalagmites. Creatures in the area must make a Strength saving throw, taking {@damage 1d6} piercing damage on a failed save. At the start of your next turn, the rocks automatically transform into stalagmites, dealing {@damage 1d6} piercing damage to creatures in the area.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th Level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Sticky Glue
entries: You touch a nonliving object or material and cover any of its surfaces with a magical glue. If the glue touches any other surface on a non-creature, it is now stuck to those surfaces. The glue lasts for 1 hour and can be undone with any solvent or by making a successful Strength check against your Save DC.

spell.name: Strength Sap
entries: You target a creature within range, sending an essence tether towards it. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, you deal {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage and reduce the target’s Strength score by 2 until the start of your next turn.
This spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Sudden Break
entries: As an action, you expel a wave of sound out from your hand. Creatures in a 10-foot cone from you must succeed in a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} thunder damage.
This spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach certain levels: 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Swift Leaves
entries: You touch one willing creature and a magical wind starts to float around them, carrying leaves. Once before the spell ends, the target can use a bonus action to take the Dodge action. The spell then ends.

spell.name: Symbiosis
entries: You connect the minds of two willing creatures within 60 feet of you together. The next time the two targets make an ability check to make the same action, they have advantage on the ability check.

spell.name: Taunting Blade

m.text: A melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you make a melee weapon attack against one creature. On a hit, the target suffers the attack’s normal effects and gets colored with a silver light until the start of your next turn.
If the target deals damage to to a creature other than you while colored with the silver light, it takes {@damage 1d8} slashing damage.

At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} slashing damage to the target, and the slashing damage dealt by the silver light increases to {@dice 2d8}. The damage rolls each increase by {@dice 1d8} respectively at 11th level and 17th level.

spell.name: Terrifying Roar
entries: You roar like a ferocious beast in the wild at a target within range. If the target can hear you (though it need not understand you), it must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of your next turn. This has no effect on creatures with higher hitpoints than you.

spell.name: Third Eye
entries: You create a psionic eye in a square within 15 feet of you, even if your view of the square is obstructed.

As an bonus action, you can gain vision on anything within 5 feet of the eye’s only while you are also within 30 feet of the eye. A creature within 5 feet of the eye can see the eye and make a Wisdom (Perception) check to dispel it.

spell.name: Time Whirl
entries: You warp time itself, causing ripples to form in time, enveloping a creature you touch. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d4} psychic damage and on its next turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both. This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Toxin Spike
entries: You shoot toxic spikes at a target within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} poison damage and until the start of your next turn, the next weapon attack a creature makes against the target has advantage.
This spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Vibration Blade

m.text: A weapon with the thrown property worth at least 1 sp

entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you make a ranged weapon attack using a weapon with the thrown property against one creature. On a hit, the target suffers the attack’s normal effects, and if the weapon is thrown beyond its normal range, it takes additional thunder damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} thunder damage to the target, and the thunder damage dealt by throwing a weapon beyond its normal range increases to {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier. The damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 3d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Vitality Burst
entries: You restore vitality to creature you touch. You can expend one of your hit dice to grant that creature hit points equivalent to a roll of the hit die. This spell does not effect undead or constructs.

The maximum number of hit die you can choose to expend increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2), 11th level (3), and 17th level (4). You can choose to spend less hit die than the maximum, but the number of dice rolled is always equivalent to the number of hit die expended.

spell.name: Wall of Bubbles
entries: You raise a 10x10x1 ft. wall of bubbles from the ground in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. For the duration, perception checks made through the wall that rely on sight, as well as ranged attacks which are made against targets on the opposite side of the wall as the attacker, are made with disadvantage. This spell ends early if an object or creature moves through or into the walls space, or if it is subject to any damage.

spell.name: Wave Excitation
entries: You excite the inherent energy in space, creating a damaging wave that hits an enemy you can touch.
Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} force damage.

The spell creates more than one wave when you reach higher levels: two waves at 5th level, three waves at 11th level, and four waves at 17th level. You can direct the waves at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each wave.

spell.name: Weaken
entries: You send a blast of weakening magic at the target. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the target takes {@damage 1d4} poison damage and has disadvantage on its next Constitution saving throw until the start of your next turn.
This spell’s damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach certain levels: 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).
